lines.gurmukhi: jYsy mnu DwvY pr qn Dn dUKnw lau; sRI gur srin swDsMg lau n AwveI [

Unknown.translation: Just as the mind runs after other's woman, other's wealth and vituperation of others, it does not come to the refuge of the True Guru and assembly of noble people.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs qrHwˆ nwl mn dOVdw hY pr iqRXw pr Dn qQw prwey AOguxwˆ dy q`kn v`l Es qrwˆ dI iK`c nwl gurU mhwrwj dI srx vw swD sMgq v`l nhIˆ dOVÎw AOˆdw[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy mnu prwDIn hIn dInqw mY; swDsMg siqgur syvw n lgwveI [

Unknown.translation: Just as the mind remains involved in inferior, disrespectful service of others, it does not do similar service of the True Guru and holy assembly of saintly persons.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs qrHwˆ nwl mn lgdw hY prweI ADIngI dUsry dI qwibAwdwrI syvw Aru hwnq vwlI kmInI kwr ivc qQw dInqw KuSwmd krn Xw lokwˆ dIAwˆ bu`qIAwˆ kFn ivKy[ Eho jyhw ieh swD sMgq vw siqgurwˆ dI syvw tihl ivKy nhIˆ Apxy Awp nUM lgOˆdw[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy mnu ikriq ibriq mY mgnu hoie; swDsMg kIrqn mY n TihrwveI [

Unknown.translation: Just as the mind remains engrossed in the worldly affairs, it does not attach itself with the adulations of God arid pious congregation.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs Bwˆq mn ibriq ApjIvkw pwlx posn ijMdgI ibqIq krn vwlI ikrq kmweI ivc mgn huMdw iBjdw ruJdw hY[ swD sMgiq AMdr vwihgurU dy Bjn kIrqn krn ivc aus Bwˆq nhIˆ itikAw krdw[

lines.gurmukhi: kUkr ijau cauc kwiF cwkI cwitby kau jwie; jw ky mITI lwgI dyKY qwhI pwCY DwveI [235[

Unknown.translation: Just as a dog runs to lick the millstone, so does a greedy person run after him with whom he sees the sweet avarice of maya (mammon). (235)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: s`c mu`c jIkU ku`qw l`b mwirAw bUQI k`FI c`kI c`tn vwsqy dOiVAw jwˆdw hY, qIkUM hI ieh BI lwlc dw mwirAw ijs dy pws mITI mwXw lwgI dyKy dyKx lgdw dyK pOˆdw hY Esy dy ipCy hI dOV qurdw hY ]235]
